entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
